extDescription.message: Remove ads, suggested pages and posts on News feed of Facebook.

extSettingsDesc.message: You can change the setting of QCLean. To apply those settings, please reload your Facebook page.

optRemoveAdsDesc.message: Hide advertisments on the right panel.

optRemoveRecommendedPostsDesc.message: Hide sponsored posts on Facebook news feed.

optCollaspeRightPanelDesc.message: Collaspe content like `People you may know`, `Friend request`, `Games you may like`, `Events in your network`, `Recent friends`..., you can click title to see the content.

optRemoveGameRecommendDesc.message: Hide recommended games on the top of chat bar.

optAutoReportDesc.message: Automatically report error of this extension to developer, so developer can fix it as soon as possible.

optDebugDesc.message: In debug mode, posts and advertisments will not be hid, they will be highlighted.
